name: Veekz
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues with Island Creole loanwords
diet centered on salted fish, seaweed fermentations
constraints: no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics

ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents; limited combustion industry
notes: tech baseline near-medieval to early industrial with localized ritual magic
state affiliation unspecified; coastal inference from name/tags
